title: Silver Plan
description: A focused consultation to address your personal concerns and provide immediate guidance.
features: Guidance on any mental health concerns of your choice
Actionable advice tailored to your specific needs
Empathic understanding and continuous support throughout the session

title: Gold Plan (Most Popular)
description: A comprehensive session designed to explore challenges and provide clarity for long-term well-being.
features: Guidance on mental health, topics of your choice, such as OCD, recovering from a break up and emotional healing
Discussion on strategies for lasting emotional well-being
Insightful techniques for personal growth and mental clarity

title: Platinum Plan
description: Extensive, holistic support tailored for deep emotional transformation and sustainable growth.
features: 6 hours of comprehensive Skype consultation with Mehran
Guidance on any mental health topics of your choice across multiple sessions
Ongoing support with flexible session scheduling
Empathic understanding and continuous support throughout the process
